body_html:
for some reason you have /home/ruikun/anaconda/include/THPP/ which doesn't look right.
Please rm -rf /home/ruikun/anaconda/include/THPP/, and/or cleanup existing installs of pytorch with the commands:

conda uninstall -y pytorch
pip uninstall -y torch
pip uninstall -y torch

body:
for some reason you have `/home/ruikun/anaconda/include/THPP/` which doesn't look right.
Please `rm -rf /home/ruikun/anaconda/include/THPP/`, and/or cleanup existing installs of pytorch with the commands:

```
conda uninstall -y pytorch
pip uninstall -y torch
pip uninstall -y torch
```
